dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Mycap At Test App
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
mycap_at_test_app
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
This app requires access to your calendars to read and create events.
This app requires access to your reminders to read and create tasks.
This app requires access to your contacts to read and manage contact information.
This app requires access to your camera to take photos and record videos.
This app requires access to your microphone to record audio.
This app requires speech recognition to convert spoken words into text.
This app requires access to your photo library to read and save images.
This app requires your location while in use to provide location-based features.
This app requires your location at all times to support background location updates.
This app requires access to motion and fitness data to track your activity.
This app requires Bluetooth access to discover and communicate with devices.
This app requires access to your media library to read and play your music and videos.
This app requires access to your media library to organize and manage your media content.
This app would like permission to track you across apps and websites for advertising purposes.
This app requires the ability to send critical alerts that bypass Do Not Disturb.
This app requires Siri integration to provide voice command features.
